```{r}
library(tidyverse)
diamonds
```

1.
```{r}
ggplot(data=diamonds, aes(x=price)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(~cut)
```
2. 
```{r}
ggplot(data=diamonds, aes(x=price)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(~cut) +
  theme(plot.background=element_rect("hotpink"),
        panel.grid.major=element_line("green"))
```
